svg.title: The Anatomy of a Prompt: 7 Building Blocks
svg.desc: A visual diagram showing the seven components of an effective prompt structure

text.font-family: -apple-system, BlinkMacSystemFont, 'Segoe UI', Roboto, Helvetica, Arial, sans-serif

svg.text: Background information and purpose for the model. Sets the stage.

svg.text: Order matters: Early tokens steer the search space, but recency can override in conflicts
